MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  CW10 postcode area of Middlewich, affecting properties in Cross Lane, Booth Lane, Alexandra Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  3:43PM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 6:45PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:55PM on 28th November 2020
